messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] OT/ was language
messages.msgSnippet: ... I was born in 1952 and took Russian for 3 weeks because my high school messed up my schedule and put me in Russian by mistake. pam
messages.messageBody:
On Thursday, July 10, 2003, at 06:16 PM, Betsy wrote:

>
> **I was born in 1959 and I took Russian because it was cool. Betsy,
> are we
> twins separated at birth!?**
>
> Paula**
>
I was born in 1952 and took Russian for 3 weeks because my high school
messed up my schedule and put me in Russian by mistake.

pam

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] OT/ was language
messages.msgSnippet: **I was born in 1959 and I took Russian because it was cool. Betsy, are we twins separated at birth!?** Paula** Got to be!  Didn t you say that you are
messages.messageBody:
**I was born in 1959 and I took Russian because it was cool. Betsy, are we
twins separated at birth!?**

Paula**


Got to be! Didn't you say that you are studying the Buffy curriculum at
your house?

I can say "vampire slayer" in Spanish, but not in Russian. Love my DVD subtitles.

Which one of us is the evil twin, or should we take turns? <bweg?>

Betsy

**PS - oh, and all I can remember is "How is the weather today?" **

All I can say in Esperanto is "Am I beautiful?" which is even less
useful for light conversation.
